Name: Planet Surf: The Last Wave
About the game: Planet Surf: The Last Wave is a physics/arcade/surf game on space! The ultimate surf trip! Ride the planet's last wave while dodging deadly meteors! You have 3 minutes to collect enough energy crystals before the planet explodes. Ride endless waves! Dodge deadly meteors! Surf in unique planets ! Beat your friend's score with planet specific leaderboards ! Original soundtrack ! Become the best surfer in the galaxy!
